title: Striking 3 Bedroom Modern Sea View Villa in Bangpor
description:
Key Features
•	3 bedroom, 3 bathroom sea view villa
•	2 on the second floor, one on the 1st floor 
•	Located in private part of Bangpor hills
•	Panoramic ocean & mountain views
•	Fully furnished & decorated throughout 
•	Private infinity swimming pool (7x3.5m)
•	Private terrace/sundeck & sala
•	air-conditioning & ceiling fans 
•	Ensuite modern fitted bathrooms 
•	Fully equipped Western kitchen
•	Built in microwave/oven
•	Gas hob & extractor 
•	Large breakfast island
•	Large open-plan living area 
•	Gym/massage room
•	Storage room
•	Private covered parking 
•	Landscaped garden
•	Government electric
•	Rainwater harvesting   
•	Land size : 800 sqm 
•	Built size: 390 sqm
•	Indoor size : 170 sqm
•	Freehold tenure 
•	Chanote title

Location:
•	Located in North of Koh Samui in Bangpor hills
•	3 minutes drive to beach, amenities & restaurants
•	5 minutes drive to Nathon town & ferry piers
•	30 minutes drive to International airport
